package example;

#include <java.sql.Time>;

class Mentor
{
  private:

  //------------------------
  // STATIC VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  const static int MAX = 100;
  const static int MIN = -99;
  const static String HELLO = "Hello";
  static int nextX = 1;

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Mentor Attributes
  String str;
  String str2;
  String someName;
  double lDoub;
  bool lBool;
  String name;
  Date d;
  Time t;
  int i;
  String p;
  String q;
  String r;
  String s;
  Date t;
  Time u;
  Date v;
  Time w;

  //Autounique Attributes
  int x;

  //Helper Variables
  private boolean canSetStr;
  private boolean canSetStr2;
  private boolean canSetS;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------
  public:

  public Mentor(String aStr, Date aD, int aI)
  {
    str = aStr;
    canSetStr = false;
    canSetStr2 = true;
    someName = aSomeName;
    lDoub = aLDoub;
    lBool = aLBool;
    name = "Johannes";
    d = aD;
    t = new Time();
    i = aI;
    resetP();
    q = "chicken";
    resetR();
    s = "123";
    canSetS = false;
    t = Date.valueOf("1978-12-25");
    u = Time.valueOf("12:13:14");
    resetV();
    resetW();
    x = nextX++;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  bool setStr2(String aStr2)
  {
    bool wasSet = false;
    if (!canSetStr2) { return false; }
    canSetStr2 = false;
    str2 = aStr2;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;
  }

  bool setSomeName(String aSomeName)
  {
    bool wasSet = false;
    someName = aSomeName;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;

    bool wasSet = false;

    wasSet = true;

    bool wasSet = false;

    wasSet = true;

    bool wasSet = false;

    bool wasSet = false;

    wasSet = true;

    bool wasSet = false;
    p = aP;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;
  }

  bool resetP()
  {
    bool wasReset = false;
    p = getDefaultP();
    wasReset = true;
    return wasReset;

    bool wasSet = false;
    q = aQ;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;

    bool wasSet = false;

    bool wasReset = false;
    v = getDefaultV();
    wasReset = true;

  {
    bool wasSet = false;
    w = aW;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;

  {
    bool wasReset = false;
    w = getDefaultW();
    wasReset = true;
    return wasReset;

  {
    return str;

    return str2;

    return someName;

    return lBool;

    return name;

    return d;

  int getI()
  {
    return i;
  }

  int getDerivedTwiceI()
  {
    return i*2;
  }

  String getP()
  {
    return p;
  }

  String getDefaultP()
  {
    return "robot";
  }

  String getQ()

    return q;
  }

  String getR()
  {
    return r;

    return w;

  {
    return Time.valueOf("12:59:59");

    return x;
